alert.note: Alert for Gates; Hertford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hertford, northwestern Gates, southwestern Isle of Wight, and southeastern Southampton Counties, the City of Franklin and the southwestern City of Suffolk through 430 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carrsville to 7 miles south of Franklin to near Como. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Gatesville, Holland, Suffolk, Gates, Como, Roduco, Whaleyville, Carrsville, Hunterdale, Topsy, Suffolk Airport, Buckland, Dort, Sunbeam, Lees Mill, Bartonsville, Riverdale, Nurney and Elwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
